    title: '',
    description: '',
    priority: 'medium' as 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' | 'urgent',
    category: '',
    customer_id: '',
    assigned_to: '',
    status: 'open' as 'open' | 'in_progress' | 'closed' | 'resolved',
